title: Gold Jewlery typeface ID
content:
Hi everyone on the information super highway

Im working on an idea for a friends skateboard company. I would like to try and ID the typeface used on this vintage jewelry we found when doing some image research for an idea we have for a board - i know that it has had some treatment by giving it the swoosh underline, can anyone throw some light on which was the original typeface? Is it a set of characters with a swashes?

Thanks again as always, typophile hasnâ€™t let us down yet!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522223311/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_251.png) | 98.26 KB |
author: commonprojects

comments.content:
thanks Steven

im not sure if its metroscript but this is getting closer...

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/coffee-service/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522223311/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/coffee-service/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/coffee-service/")

anyone else throw any light?
